runs.comm: back of a length on off stump, blocked into the off side
down the track, and Dickwella is off the mark in style. Gets his front leg away from the line as Nehra follows him, and lifts it up and over cover

and he's gone. Bouncer outside off, looks for the pull, and that isn't the cleverest shot given the line and given the fact that he's watched India getting out to the steep bounce. Top-edges it, and pops up a simple catch to mid-on
back of a length, angling down leg. Misses the flick and it deflects off the thigh pad into the square leg region
short and wide, too wide for Chandimal to connect with the attempted slash
back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and chops towards backward point

short and wide, goes for the slash away from his body, and gets a thick edge that flies over the slips. Rahane leaps up at first slip, gets his fingertips to it, but can't hold on to the half-chance. It went very quickly off the edge
length ball on off stump, looks for the pushed single to short cover and he's sent back
back of a length angling away into the corridor and it beats Gunathilaka's outside edge with a bit of extra bounce. Poked at it without moving his feet
a bit straighter in line, pushed to midwicket with a straight bat
length ball angling across, goes for the big hoick and misses and it sails a foot over off stump

back of a length, gets this to straighten into the batsman. Gunathilaka hops to defend and it goes past the inside edge, hits his back thigh, and dies down towards Dhoni falling to his left, and he spills the ball off the edge of his glove
length ball, once again it seams in past the inside edge of his defensive push and carries through steeply to Dhoni
back of a length on off stump, gets forward to defend towards mid-on
shortish on leg stump. Chandimal hops up to tuck it off his hip into the fine leg region. Didn't get too much bat on it
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and defends towards backward point

another bouncer outside off, another batsman looks to pull, and he doesn't quite middle it but gets enough bat on it to get it to carry over the square leg boundary, to the right of Ashwin chasing from long leg
fullish outside off and Gunathilaka goes hard at it, swipes it to mid-on with a lot of bottom hand
short outside off, goes for the pull again, and is through his shot too soon, makes no contact
length ball outside off, gets a big stride forward for a checked push to the left of short extra cover
back of a length down the leg side, and it isn't called wide. Interesting decision. Gunathilaka moved across and looked to tuck it off his hip
back of a length outside off, punched towards cover point
shortish outside off, slapped hard into the ground and it bounces up to cover point
back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away to the left of midwicket
back of a length, angling into middle stump, gets on his toes to ride the bounce and tucks it away through square leg

full on middle stump, and that's well played, got his front foot away from it and brought down a straight bat to lift it over mid-on. Didn't make ideal contact, but did well to play with a straight bat and scooped it over the fielder nonetheless
and then he goes for an ambitious flat-bat slash. Length ball wide of off and he makes room, swings, and misses

another short ball, another miscued pull, another wicket. Skidded on outside off, and it hit high on the bat, went off it without too much power, and Dhawan leaped up to catch it over his head with both hands at mid-on
back of a length outside off, not enough width to cut, and he inside-edges it past his off stump, towards fine leg
back of a length outside off, gets his back foot across and steers it down to third man
back of a length on leg stump, tucked away quietly into the leg side
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and dabs to backward point
short and wide, Kapugedera thrashes at it and misses
back of a length, angling into off stump, defended towards backward point
full outside off, seams away a touch as he aims a drive through cover, gets a thickish outside edge down to third man
length ball outside off, shuffles across to get closer to it and dabs towards backward point

back of a length, too close to off stump to cut, chops it down towards backward point and they go for the quick single. A direct hit from Jadeja at the keeper's end would have probably had Kapugedera in trouble
length ball outside off, gets forward to block into the covers
length ball on off stump, makes a bit of room and pokes it away into the point region
flighted ball outside off, gets forward for a checked drive to short cover
a bit closer to off stump and he drives it down to long-on
length ball on middle stump, Kapugedera comes forward with his front leg inside the line and pokes it away through point
line shifts a bit wider and he plays a checked push out to sweeper cover
fullish and wide outside off, reaches out to drive and slices to third man
full outside off, gets forward and steers with an open face to backward point, where Jadeja moves quickly to his right and makes a diving stop
length ball on off stump, straightens a touch, blocked back to the bowler
full and wide and the ball doesn't do much at all. Kapugedera can get forward, free his arms, and flat-bat merrily to the left of the diving Yuvraj at sweeper cover
back of a length now, straightens towards off stump. Kapugedera pokes at it, gets opened up and gets a thick outside edge that drops down short of backward point
back of a length outside off. Kapugedera looks for the dab to third man with his weight on the front foot and the ball skids past his outside edge
length ball outside off, blocked into the covers
and now that ball that rips past the outside edge. Bowls it a bit slower, gets it to drop on the batsman as he reaches out to defend
tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover
this one is fired in, following the batsman as he backs away to make room, forces him to defend into the on side
makes room again and Jadeja fires in a back-of-a-length ball that cramps him, punched to short cover
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and dabs towards deep point
length ball outside off, presses forward and blocks into the covers
length ball, jags in off the seam. Looks to whip it into the on side and he inside-edges it behind, where Dhoni dives to his left and spills the ball. Not sure if it carried. Fell well short
back of a length on off stump, some inward movement again to cramp him for room as he backs away to cut. Ends up chopping it a short distance into the off side
a bit of width this time, slapped straight to backward point
down the track, and that is hammered. Lands on the perfect length for an attacking shot, and he flat-bats hard down the ground and Chandimal did brilliantly to dive out of the way of the shot
short ball outside off, gets steep bounce, and Dhoni applauds as he watches the top-edged pull sail a long way over his head
tossed up on off stump, gets forward to work into the midwicket region
shortish outside off, and that is a lovely shot, waits on it and cuts it away to the right of backward point
full, skidding in with the angle to hit front pad as he plays around it. Was missing leg stump by a long way
shortish, angling into the batsman, pulled down to long-on
tossed up on middle stump, no turn. Looks for the drive to long-off, hits it back to the bowler off the inner half of the bat
this one's a bit slower on middle and leg, and he gets his front leg out of the way and sinks down low to slog-sweep firmly over the square leg boundary
tossed up full on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
tossed up slow outside off, goes for the slog-sweep, and doesn't hit as square as he intended. Dhawan runs in from deep midwicket, dives forward, and it doesn't quite carry

Given! Sharp turn to hit the front pad as he comes forward to drive down the ground. It dipped on him and he had to reach for it, and then spun past his inside edge. Hit him in front of middle stump, but he'd taken a long stride forward, and I have a feeling it might have been missing leg stump
quicker ball from around the wicket, fairly full. Whipped into the backward square leg region
length ball outside off, not much turn, looks to whip it into the leg side but can only play it back to the bowler
shorter now and he can go back and tuck it away to deep backward square leg
quickish length ball on off stump, clipped to midwicket
fullish on middle stump, driven to long-on
tossed up outside off, drives in the air but well wide of short cover diving to his left
quicker now, on off stump. Looks to clip to long-on and Jadeja moves quickly to his left from straight midwicket to dive and cut it off
tossed up on middle stump, swept to deep backward square leg

down the track and he's not quite to the pitch of this one, bowled a little slower and wider. Reaches out to drive, checks his shot, and ends up chipping it into the gap between long-off and sweeper cover, bounces down between those two fielders
length ball outside off, gets forward to clip to long-on
oh, nearly bowls him with the carrom ball. Saw him coming and bowled it quicker and shorter, the ball came in as he looked to drive and the inside edge bounced away wide of the stumps
loose ball, short, and he pulls it away to the left of midwicket
loopy flight outside off and sharp turn. Dips a bit as he looks to drive to long-off, and it grips and turns and goes off the outside half of his bat to sweeper cover

back of a length on off stump, lets it come on and dabs towards backward point. Yuvraj has to move to his right, has to go around the ball a bit to pick up and throw, and takes too long to aim at the bowler's end as they complete the single easily
another carrom ball, makes a bit of room and dabs it riskily to backward point
down the track, whips the flighted ball to midwicket
looks to sweep from outside off, it's a little too full for that, and it hits his front pad. Strikes him well outside the line

down the track to the flighted ball, gets to the pitch for a drive to long-on. Pandya chased it down quickly to his left, and took his eye off the ball momentarily as he bent to pick it up, and fumbled to allow a second run
down the track and that's a slightly miscued six. Was a little too far inside the line of it. Went through with the shot anyway, finished with a full follow-through to send it soaring over long-off

quicker ball, and he's gone! Looks to shuffle across and flick, it was on the stumps, and he missed. Ball hits his front pad in front of middle and leg, and I have a feeling this might also have been missing leg stump. But replays suggest it might just have been hitting. He had got a long way across. First replay I saw was from a mid-off angle, and that might have deceived me a little
back of a length close to off stump, gets on the back foot to defend to midwicket
looks to slog across a length ball and it straightens in and hits him on the top of the back thigh, deflects towards backward point
back of a length outside off, dabbed to backward point
short and very wide. Reaches out to cut, can't connect
short and wide, and this time it's within his reach. Plays a good-looking steer out to the left of Yuvraj at deep point
back of a length on off and middle, defended into the covers
back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
back of a length, angling in. Hurries on a bit as he shuffles across to flick, and it hits him on the thigh pad
tossed up wide of off, driven to sweeper cover
tossed up slow outside off and it drops well short of Shanaka as he looks to slog-sweep, hits him on the chest
quicker carrom ball on off stump, poked back watchfully to the bowler

taken! What a catch from Raina! Jumps to his right from square leg to grab a full-blooded sweep with both hands. Wasn't too far from him, so he didn't throw himself at the ball, just jumped sideways and judged it perfectly
back of a length, turning down leg, tucked away gently to the right of square leg
full on middle and leg, gets his front pad out of the way to drive back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, dabbed gently towards backward point
short, very wide, toe-ends it to third man as he reaches out to slash

quick, skiddy short ball angling in from wide of the crease. Misses the pull and it goes over the top of the stumps to Dhoni, who appeals for the catch after diving to his left and pouching the ball. Bumrah didn't appeal. May have clipped a shirtsleeve
length ball, pushed gently into the mid-on region

short ball, and Siriwardana has just paddle-pulled it for six. Goes deep in his crease, maybe expecting the short ball, and just swivelled at it. Checked his shot a little, but he middled it and cleared the square leg boundary
back of a length on off stump, and that's another interesting-looking short-arm whip/pull to win it for Sri Lanka. Opened up slightly and hit it firmly to the midwicket boundary
